Posts.Content: Aug 18, 2014 03:48AM courtnay wrote: seeing a doctor is the most important thing.   Look at it as a blessing instead of a burden because now you can work at getting better.  See what the doctor says before you freak out He or she might say you are fine.  Hopefully you are
Posts.Title: it starts again didette2006 didette2006

Posts.Content: Aug 18, 2014 06:18AM courtnay wrote: First of all know that you can beat cancer at any stage. You can also go to the Inspyr support community much like this one where people discuss about treatments and learn from eachother. There re many things you can do besides or in combination with radiation or chemo and surgery. A few examples are lycopene or you can roast tomatoes to get more of a lycopene boost. Start drinking lots of fruit and vegetable smoothies. I could go on but this will help
